library_url.title: Library URL
library_url.description: URL of the Mindtouch / Nice CXone Expert instance (must NOT contain trailing slash), e.g. for LibreTexts Geosciences it is https://geo.libretexts.org

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Custom publisher name (ZIM metadata). openZIM otherwise

file_name.title: ZIM filename
file_name.description: ZIM filename. Do not input trailing `.zim`, it will be automatically added. Defaults to {name}_{period}

tags.title: ZIM Tags
tags.description: A semicolon (;) delimited list of tags to add to the ZIM.

secondary_color.title: Secondary color
secondary_color.description: Secondary (background) color of ZIM UI. Default: '#FFFFFF'

page_id_include.title: Page ID include
page_id_include.description: CSV of page ids to include. Parent pages will be included as well for proper navigation, up to root (or subroot if --root-page-id set). Can be combined with --page-title-include (pages with matching title or id will be included)

page_title_include.title: Page title include regex
page_title_include.description: Includes only pages with title matching the given regular expression, and their parent pages for proper navigation, up to root (or subroot if --root-page-id set). Can be combined with --page-id-include (pages with matching title or id will be included)

page_title_exclude.title: Page title exclude regex
page_title_exclude.description: Excludes pages with title matching the given regular expression

root_page_id.title: Root page ID
root_page_id.description: ID of the root page to include in ZIM. Only this page and its subpages will be included in the ZIM

illustration_url.title: Illustration URL
illustration_url.description: URL to illustration to use for ZIM illustration and favicon

optimization_cache.title: Optimization Cache URL
optimization_cache.description: S3 Storage URL including credentials and bucket

assets_workers.title: Asset workers
assets_workers.description: Number of parallel workers for asset processing. Default: 10

bad_assets_regex.title: Bad assets regex
bad_assets_regex.description: Regular expression of asset URLs known to not be available. Case insensitive.

bad_assets_threshold.title: Bad assets threshold
bad_assets_threshold.description: [dev] Number of assets allowed to fail to download before failing the scraper. Assets already excluded with --bad-assets-regex are not counted for this threshold. Defaults to 10 assets.

stats_filename.title: Stats filename
stats_filename.description: Scraping progress file. Leave it as `/output/task_progress.json`

output.title: Output folder
output.description: Output folder for ZIM file(s). Leave it as `/output`
